targets.query:
from(bucket: "iiot")
  |> range(start: -6h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "reading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1)

from(bucket: "iiot")
  |> range(start: -6h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "reading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1)

from(bucket: "iiot")
  |> range(start: -6h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "reading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit == "Â°C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "iiot")
  |> range(start: -6h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "reading")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.unit == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
